Text: Gajabrishta:  'Brishta' is the back portion of a sitting elephant.
Triplets:<Gajabrishta
2:
--------------------
Text: Gajabrishta:  The later Cholas of the Chola empire in Indian subcontinent, especially the ones in the Thondai Mandalam around the North Tamil Nadu area constructed temples which had this vimanas.
Triplets:<The later Cholas
